title: 786 4 "Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!"Transliteration: "Totto Rando! Yonkō Biggu Mamu Tōjō!" (Japanese:万国！　四皇ビッグ・マム登場) Directed by: Toshinori FukuzawaStoryboarded by: Tetsuya Endō Tomohiro Nakayama April 30, 2017(2017-04-30)
transformers_text:
786 4 "Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!"Transliteration: "Totto Rando! Yonkō Biggu Mamu Tōjō!" (Japanese:万国！　四皇ビッグ・マム登場) Directed by: Toshinori FukuzawaStoryboarded by: Tetsuya Endō Tomohiro Nakayama April 30, 2017(2017-04-30)

The Sanji retrieval team disembarks on Cacao Island, an island close to Whole Cake Island in which everything on it is made of chocolate. Luffy and Chopper eat an entire café and are nearly arrested, but are saved by the cafe's owner, Charlotte Pudding. They converse with her, but Luffy accidentally reveals who he is. On Whole Cake Island, Big Mom oversees the preparation for the wedding tea party, which will occur in three days.
